user.title: Trafiklab
user.description: Set up your Trafiklab integration to get public transport information.

data.line_filter: Line Filter (comma-separated, leave empty for all lines)
data.direction: Direction (0, 1, or 2, leave empty for both directions)

data_description.sensor_type: Choose whether to monitor departures from or arrivals to this stop
data_description.line_filter: Filter by specific line numbers (e.g., '1,4,7' for lines 1, 4, and 7)
data_description.direction: Filter by direction: 0 for direction 1, 1 for direction 2, 2 for both directions
data_description.time_window: How many minutes ahead to search for departures/arrivals (1-1440 minutes)
data_description.refresh_interval: How often to refresh data from the API (60-3600 seconds). Consider your API quota limits - Bronze: 25 calls/min, Silver: 150 calls/min. Default 300 seconds (5 minutes) is recommended for most users.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to Trafiklab API

abort.already_configured: This sensor configuration is already configured
